mapper.select:
/*VideoInfoMapper.selectWatchVideoList*/
select US.USER_ID, US.ORDER_NO, US.VIDEO_ID, VM.VIDEO_TYPE, VM.VIDEO_SVC_ID, MT.TITLE, TO_CHAR(MT.DD_SHOWING, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS DD_SHOWING, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(substr(MT.DT_TELEVISE,0,8)), 'YYYY.MM.DD'), 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS DT_TELEVISE, US.WATCH_DATE, US.WATCH_TIME from USER_SEQUENCE US, VIDEO_MAP VM, ( select VC.ID_CONTENTS AS ID_CONTENTS, VC.TITLE AS TITLE, VCG.DD_SHOWING AS DD_SHOWING, VCG.DT_TELEVISE AS DT_TELEVISE from VCMS_CONTENTS VC, VCMS_CONTENTS_GENERAL VCG where VC.ID_CONTENTS = VCG.ID_CONTENTS ) MT where 1=1 and US.VIDEO_ID = VM.VIDEO_ID and VM.VIDEO_SVC_ID = MT.ID_CONTENTS and US.USER_ID = ( select A.USER_ID from USER_MAP A where 1=1 and A.USER_SVC_ID = #{userSvnId} and ROWNUM = 1 ) and ROWNUM <= 50 order by US.ORDER_NO DESC

/*VideoInfoMapper.selectRecommendationVideoList*/
select UC.USER_ID, UC.ORDER_NO, UC.VIDEO_ID, VM.VIDEO_TYPE, VM.VIDEO_SVC_ID, MT.TITLE, TO_CHAR(MT.DD_SHOWING, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS DD_SHOWING, UC.SCORE from USER_CANDIDATES UC, VIDEO_MAP VM, ( select VC.ID_CONTENTS AS ID_CONTENTS, VC.TITLE AS TITLE, VCG.DD_SHOWING AS DD_SHOWING, VCG.DT_TELEVISE AS DT_TELEVISE from VCMS_CONTENTS VC, VCMS_CONTENTS_GENERAL VCG where VC.ID_CONTENTS = VCG.ID_CONTENTS ) MT where 1=1 and UC.VIDEO_ID = VM.VIDEO_ID and VM.VIDEO_SVC_ID = MT.ID_CONTENTS and UC.USER_ID = ( select A.USER_ID from USER_MAP A where 1=1 and A.USER_SVC_ID = #{userSvnId} and ROWNUM = 1 ) and ROWNUM <= 50 order by UC.ORDER_NO
